de.i3mainz.pcl

Class SampleConsensus

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.i3mainz.pcl.nat.NativeObject
      • de.i3mainz.pcl.SampleConsensus
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    RandomSampleConsensus

    public abstract class SampleConsensus
extends NativeObject
    SampleConsensus represents the base class. All sample consensus methods must inherit from this class.
    See Also:
    pcl::SampleConsensus documentation
